action_item: Requirements - Update meeting invites to include the requirement for sharing the NextGen screen.
notes: Ensure all participants are aware of the requirement to share their NextGen screen during meetings.

action_item: Requirements - Send an email with expectations regarding NextGen usage.
notes: Include details on what information needs to be inputted into NextGen.

action_item: Requirements - Develop a case management portal in NextGen for the Baby's Born Healthy program.
notes: This portal is necessary to manage cases without triggering billing for unbillable services.

action_item: Requirements - Identify and document appointment types and calendar categories for non-billable services.
notes: Set up appointment templates in Dr. Cloud EHR for non-billable encounters.

action_item: Data Migration - Ensure all information entered before the cloud transition is transferable.
notes: Confirm with Angeline on the details needed for the transfer.

action_item: Workflow - Clarify the workflow for home visits and documentation process.
notes: Determine how staff will document visits and what tools they will use.
